items.sentence: My parents said that I was too young to do that.
Tom is in the hospital with a broken collarbone.
If Tom hadn't been there, Mary would've drowned.
Tom will probably be the last one off the plane.
How soon do you think you'll be able to do that?
The picnic was postponed because it was raining.
I like you a lot, but I don't want to marry you.
I'm sure you'd feel better if you ate something.
I made a mistake and I don't know how to fix it.
I feel this way around the same time every year.
Many people have asked me why I like doing this.
Tom stopped Mary before she could do any damage.
Why don't you come and live with us for a while?
Without the map, we wouldn't have found the way.
I still have a lot of things that I need to buy.
I'm going to stay here with you, no matter what.
That blonde girl with curly hair is from Sweden.
The famous building, the Taj Mahal, is in India.
The company has purchased a new computer system.
You have a choice of black tea, coffee, or milk.
